title: Moroccan Sweet Potato & Prawn Salad
ingredients: ['750g sweet potatoes, diced', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '3 teaspoons rose harissa paste (or regular harissa paste)', '1 lemon, zested and juiced', '75g pine nuts, toasted', '1 (260g) pack cooked, peeled tiger prawns', '100g baby leaf salad']
